column5: Wondering if anyone has pulled a boat through Portal since the tragedy and what it was like. Seems that every entrance has its' own methods and procedures....

Just came back from Canada through the port at Fortuna,ND. No problem going in, but coming back into the US will take a while. The US customs have orders to check everything, luggage, coolers, boxes, & everything in the boat. They have to run ID checks also. Not a problem, they are just doing their job. About a 20 minute wait for us, but Portal could be busier being a 24 hour port. take care,Brad
